Articles.Content:
The Mk. 1-2 pod will do some strange things. On launch, It will immediately begin flying at 174 m/s until a RUD occurs. EVA results in Jeb cloning, and the capsule can fall through the pad.

Here is my output log.Here is my output log.

Mods being used, all is up to date with the exception of Texture Replacer:
